Package com.here.mobility.sdk.demand

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DemandClient.RideUpdateListener
    Listener to be implemented by the caller, to get notifications about Ride updates.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BookingConstraints
    Constraints that the requested supplier must fulfill for the current booking.
    CancellationInfo
    Info about the cancellation of the ride.
    CreateRideRequest
    Request to create a new ride from a given offer.
    DemandClient
    The client class for accessing the demand API - requesting, booking and managing rides.
    DemandProtocol
    Responsible for encoding and decoding the wire protocol of the demand services.
    DriverDetails
    Details of the driver.
    Location
    Location Object, that encapsulates a LatLng coordinates object, and an optional address.
    PassengerDetails
    The details of a passenger.
    Price
    Price object with the amount to pay and the currency.
    PriceEstimate
    Estimation of the price.
    PriceRange
    Range of the price.
    Ride
    Active Ride.
    RideLocation
    The current location of the ride.
    RideOffer
    Ride offer from a supplier
    RideOffersRequest
    Request from the SDK to the server for rides
    RideOffersRequest.Builder
    Builder to create RideOffersRequest object.
    RideQuery
    Query to get list of rides.
    RideQuery.Builder  
    RideQueryResponse
    Response of RideQuery query.
    RideStatusLog
    Log of the current ride.
    RideStatusLog.Record  
    RideWaypoints
    The Route of the ride
    Supplier
    Supplier details.
    Vehicle
    Vehicle details.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CancellationInfo.Party
    Who cancelled the ride.
    RideOffer.CancellationPolicy
    The cancellation policy of the supplier
    RideOffersRequest.SortType
    How to sort the offers
    RideQuery.StatusFilter
    Ride statuses to filter on.
    RideStatusLog.Status
    Ride Status.
    Vehicle.Type
    The type of the vehicle.
